title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings for downloading and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API; installable via pip (ollama).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama servers; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Community Go CLI that adds interactive chat, conversation history, and prompt templates on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline code-assist copilot.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot template pre-wired to an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with CUDA, ROCm, or CPU runtimes.

title: ollama-kt (Kotlin Multiplatform)
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK (JVM/Android/Native) for Ollama; published on Maven Central.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community client with strongly-typed models and streaming chat support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline using Ollama + ChromaDB.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice that exposes additional endpoints (batch, health, metrics) over Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot written in Go that proxies group chats to an Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-model-importer
summary: Utility to convert HuggingFace safetensors/GGUF into Ollama Modelfile format and push to registry.
